entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story who is walking down a corridor with Hermione and Ron. He asks Hermione where they are going.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is hurrying to keep up with them as they walk down the corridor.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who is leading the way and walking down the corridor with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is a magical portrait that guards the entrance to Gryffindor Tower. She is talking to Ron as they walk by.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are walking down the corridor together.
Ron is talking to the Fat Lady as he walks by.
